questions.question: How do I get started with Karakib?
questions.answer: Simply create an account using your email or Google sign-in, verify your phone number, and add your collection address. Then browse waste types on the 'Add Waste' page and start adding items to your cart!

questions.question: Do I need to sign up to use Karakib?
questions.answer: Yes, you need to create an account to request waste collection. Registration is free and quick - you can use email or Google sign-in. You'll need to verify your phone number and add at least one collection address.

questions.question: What areas does Karakib serve?
questions.answer: We currently operate in Cairo, Giza, and Alexandria. We're actively working to expand to more areas. You can register your interest for new service areas through our website.

questions.question: Is there a minimum amount of waste I need to collect?
questions.answer: No, there's no minimum requirement! You can collect any quantity of waste items. Each item earns points based on its type and unit (kg or piece). Add whatever waste you have to your cart.

questions.question: How does the waste collection process work?
questions.answer: First, add waste items to your cart from the 'Add Waste' page. Review your cart, then click 'Request Collection'. Select your pickup address, choose to earn points or donate them, and submit. After your request is approved, a courier will be assigned and will contact you to schedule pickup. Once collected, points are credited to your account.

questions.question: How do I add waste to my cart?
questions.answer: Go to the 'Add Waste' page, browse waste types (Plastic, Paper, Metal, Wood, Clothes, Cooking Oil, E-Waste, or Home Appliances), select specific items, and click 'Add & Earn' to add them to your cart with the quantity you want.

questions.question: Can I add different types of waste in one request?
questions.answer: Yes! You can add multiple different waste items to your cart and submit them all in one collection request. Each item type can be included together.

questions.question: How long does it take for my request to be processed?
questions.answer: After submitting your collection request, it typically takes 1-2 business days for admin to review and assign a courier. The courier will then contact you to schedule the actual pickup time. Our service operates Sunday-Thursday, 9 AM - 5 PM.

questions.question: Can I track my collection request?
questions.answer: Yes! You can view all your collection requests in your profile under 'My Requests'. You'll see the status of each request, collection history, and related points transactions.

questions.question: What if I need to cancel or modify my request?
questions.answer: You can cancel your request before it's assigned to a courier. Once assigned, contact the courier or our support team. For modifications, you may need to cancel and create a new request with updated items.

questions.question: What types of waste does Karakib accept?
questions.answer: We accept Plastic (bottles, containers, barrels, toys, etc.), Paper & Cardboard (newspapers, boxes, cartons), Metal (cans, wires, cables), Wood (pieces, scraps), Clothes (old t-shirts, jackets, textiles), Cooking Oil (used oil), E-Waste (phones, laptops, keyboards), and Home Appliances (fans, toasters, small appliances).

questions.question: How do I know which waste items I can recycle?
questions.answer: Visit the 'Add Waste' page where you can browse all available waste types and specific items. Each item shows the points you'll earn and its unit (kg or piece). If you're unsure about a specific item, you can ask our chatbot Koko or contact support.

questions.question: Do waste items need to be clean and prepared?
questions.answer: Yes, proper preparation helps ensure your waste is accepted and recycled properly. Plastic items should be clean and dry. Paper should be free of plastic, staples, and tape. Metal cans should be rinsed. Food containers should be cleaned. Check preparation guidelines for each waste type on the item details page.

questions.question: Can I recycle broken or damaged items?
questions.answer: Yes, as long as the items are identifiable as the waste type they're categorized under. Broken electronics, damaged appliances, torn clothes, and similar items can still be recycled. Just make sure they're properly cleaned and prepared according to the guidelines.

questions.question: What if I have a waste item that's not listed?
questions.answer: If you have a waste item that doesn't match any of our listed categories, contact our support team or use the chatbot to inquire. We may be able to add new waste types or guide you to the appropriate category.

questions.question: How does the points system work?
questions.answer: You earn points based on the waste items you recycle. Each waste item has a specific points value per unit (either per kg or per piece). When you add items to your cart, you'll see how many points each item earns. After collection, points are credited to your account.

questions.question: How are points calculated?
questions.answer: Points are calculated based on the waste item type and quantity. Each waste item shows 'points per unit' - this could be per kilogram (kg) or per piece, depending on the item. The total points = points_per_unit × quantity you add to cart.

questions.question: What can I do with my points?
questions.answer: You can use points to: 1) Shop for merchandise in our store (eco-friendly products, branded items), 2) Convert points to cash through the points conversion feature, 3) Donate points to charitable causes (Education Fund, Reforestation, Community Health). Check your profile's 'My Points' section for options.

questions.question: When do I receive my points?
questions.answer: Points are credited to your account immediately after your waste is successfully collected by the courier and the collection is confirmed in the system.

questions.question: How do I view my points balance and history?
questions.answer: Go to your profile and click on 'My Points'. You'll see your current points balance, earned points history, converted points, donated points, and all point transactions.

questions.question: Can I convert points to cash?
questions.answer: Yes! You can convert your points to cash. The conversion rate and minimum amount are available in your profile under 'My Points'. Simply select the amount you want to convert and follow the process.

questions.question: Can I donate my points?
questions.answer: Absolutely! When submitting a collection request, you can choose 'Donate Points' as your payout method. You can also donate existing points from your profile to causes like Education Fund, Reforestation, or Community Health. Additionally, you can donate directly from the homepage.

questions.question: Do points expire?
questions.answer: Currently, points don't have an expiration date. However, we recommend using your points regularly to take advantage of our shop products and donation opportunities. Check our terms for any policy updates.

questions.question: Can I transfer points to another user?
questions.answer: Point transfers between users are not currently available. However, you can earn points through collections and use them for shopping, cash conversion, or donations.

questions.question: What can I buy with my points?
questions.answer: You can use points to purchase items from our shop, which includes eco-friendly products, branded merchandise (t-shirts, tote bags), and other sustainable items. Each product shows its price in points or EGP. Browse the 'Shop' page to see available products.

questions.question: How do I shop with points?
questions.answer: Browse products in the 'Shop' page, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can pay using your points balance or other payment methods if the product accepts EGP. The checkout process is similar to regular online shopping.

questions.question: Can I buy products without points?
questions.answer: Yes! Many products in our shop can be purchased with regular payment methods (EGP). Products show their price in both points and currency. You don't need points to shop - anyone can purchase our merchandise.

questions.question: How do I track my orders?
questions.answer: All your product orders are tracked in your profile under 'My Orders'. You can see order status, shipping information, and order history there.

questions.question: How do I add a collection address?
questions.answer: Go to your profile and click on 'My Addresses'. You can add multiple addresses with details like full name, phone number, street address, and city. You'll select which address to use when requesting collection.

questions.question: Can I have multiple collection addresses?
questions.answer: Yes! You can save multiple addresses in your profile (home, office, etc.) and choose which one to use for each collection request. This is useful if you want to collect from different locations.

questions.question: What information do I need for my address?
questions.answer: You'll need: Full name, Phone number, Street address (detailed address), and City. Make sure the information is accurate so the courier can find your location easily.

questions.question: What happens after I submit a collection request?
questions.answer: Your request is reviewed by admin, then assigned to an available courier. The courier will contact you to schedule the pickup. You'll receive notifications about request status. Once the courier collects your waste, points are credited to your account.

questions.question: Do I need to be home when the courier arrives?
questions.answer: Yes, you or someone you authorize should be available when the courier arrives for pickup. The courier will verify the waste items and complete the collection. Some items may require QR code verification.

questions.question: How do I update my personal information?
questions.answer: Go to your profile and click on 'Personal Info'. You can update your name, email, phone number, and other account details. Make sure to keep your information updated for smooth service.

questions.question: Can I change my password?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your password through your profile settings. If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot Password' feature on the login page to reset it via email.

questions.question: Where can I see my collection history?
questions.answer: In your profile, go to 'My Requests' to see all your collection requests, their status, and history. You can also check 'My Points' to see points earned from each collection.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: You can reach us through: Email at karakib@gmail.com, Phone at 19123, Social media (@Karakib), or use our chatbot Koko on the website for immediate assistance. Our support operates during business hours: Sunday-Thursday, 9 AM - 5 PM.

questions.question: What causes can I donate to?
questions.answer: You can donate to three main causes: Education Fund (supporting underprivileged children's education), Reforestation (planting trees and restoring natural habitats), and Community Health (supporting community health initiatives). You can donate from the homepage or when submitting collection requests.

questions.question: How do I donate points?
questions.answer: You can donate in two ways: 1) When submitting a collection request, choose 'Donate Points' as your payout method, or 2) From your profile's 'My Points' section, select the donation option and choose your cause and amount.

questions.question: Can I donate money instead of points?
questions.answer: Yes! From the homepage, you can click 'Donate' on any cause card and enter an amount in EGP. You'll be redirected to complete a secure payment. Donations are processed securely with bank-level encryption.

questions.question: Are donations secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! All donations are processed with 256-bit SSL encryption for maximum security. Your payment information is protected, and all transactions go directly to the chosen organization.

questions.question: Can I see my donation history?
questions.answer: Yes, in your profile under 'My Points', you can see your donation history including which causes you've supported and the amounts donated.

questions.question: What should I do with small amounts of waste or single items?
questions.answer: For small quantities or single items, Koko (our chatbot) can suggest creative DIY recycling ideas! Upload an image of your waste item, and Koko will provide upcycling suggestions. You can also save items until you have more to add to your collection request.

questions.question: Can the chatbot help me with DIY recycling ideas?
questions.answer: Yes! Our chatbot Koko is designed to help with DIY recycling. Upload an image of a waste item, and Koko will analyze it and suggest creative ways to repurpose or upcycle it at home. Perfect for single items or small quantities!

questions.question: Are there DIY suggestions for different waste types?
questions.answer: Yes! Each waste type has DIY suggestions available. For example, plastic bottles can become plant pots or organizers, old t-shirts can become tote bags, and metal cans can be turned into candle holders. Ask Koko or check item details for specific ideas!

questions.question: Does Karakib have a mobile app?
questions.answer: Currently, Karakib operates through our website. You can access it from any device with a web browser. We're working on expanding our platform availability.

questions.question: What browsers are supported?
questions.answer: Karakib works on all modern web browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Make sure your browser is updated to the latest version for the best experience.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All transactions are encrypted, and we follow best practices for protecting your personal information. Check our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy for details.

questions.question: What should I do if I encounter a technical issue?
questions.answer: If you experience any technical problems, try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact our support team at karakib@gmail.com or use the chatbot for assistance.
